review: She examined and listened to all the history and suggested for all round wellness of my child. Would definitely recommend to all the parents.

context: Consultation provided for all pediatric disease,
review: Very nice experience and very satisfactory solution for my son Gaaurik. The doctor listened to the issues patiently and addressed effectively

Doctor treated my child very rudely while checking for infection in mouth. *** ****** *** **** ******* ********* *********** *** ******* ** * ****. ***** **** *** *********** ** ***** *** ********* *** ** *** **** *********. Plus they charged more than what is mentioned in practo. Not proffesional place and not at all friendly doctor
Listens to our query and then carefully explains each and everything. Overall excellent pediatric doc !!

I highly recommend her , my son is now 10 years old and I always run to her from his second year and her friendly approach and detailed explanation always satisfies us best.

Only one thing is the fee amount in Apollo for specialists which I feel is too high
